title: Point Enumeration Event
description: Object representation for for a single point enumeration

name.description: Friendly name for the point, if known

possible_values.description: List of possible enumerated values for the point

units.description: Current or default unit for this point

type.description: Current or default type for this point

ref.description: Reference parameter for this point (e.g. BACnet object)

writable.description: Indicates if this point is writable or not
